DOC.criteria: T1D least 3 yrs duration . Male female age 1856 year meet American Diabetes Association standard T1DM criterion . HgbA1c < 9 % Insulin requirement < 0.8 U/kg/d Absence severe hypoglycemia past 6 month Absence ketoacidosis past 6 month Menstruating woman must negative pregnancy test willing avoid pregnancy study period .
